sentence.Network_en: A devotional prayer at morning, noon, and night to commemorate the annunciation.
sentence.Network_cn: 三钟经, 天使经为纪念耶稣降世为人而在早晨, 中午和晚上进行的虔诚的祈祷.

sentence.Network_en: The examples of its applications in annunciation and interlock circuits are listed.
sentence.Network_cn: 作了简要介绍,并列举了在信号报警和联锁保护电路中的应用实例.

sentence.Network_en: Then they changed it to March 25, a holiday called the Annunciation.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来又把元旦改到我们现在的三月二十五日, 因为那一天是“天使报喜节”.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French annonciation, from late Latin annuntiatio(n-), from the verb annuntiare (see annunciate)

entry.tran: （基督教中的）天使报喜（天使长加百列奉告圣母马利亚她将诞下圣子耶稣）
entry.def: In Christianity, the Annunciation was the announcement by the Archangel Gabriel to the Virgin Mary that she was going to give birth to the son of God.

sentences.sentence: "the government made an announcement about changes in the drug war"

auth_sentence.content: She was naturally relaxed, precise in her annunciation and a fast learner.
